entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 18.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 4 this evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness late in the morning then 60 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 22 in the morning and minus 3 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 15. POP 30%
